column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////not sure what all the fuss is about.  Money wise good value.  nice flavor.  was too mamy whole tomatoes for me in sauce.  added parm and pepper flakes.  That helped.  Brough wrong salad
column2: but ok.  Waiter did not want to be here.  Something smelled like a dirty dish towel.  Might try on another trip....
